module.name: project_management_resource_information
module.keywords: management resource information, module, project management

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the approval, certification, classification, contract, date, timing, documentation, effectivity, identification, justification, language, reference data, and security data to product and activity data.
This module defines data structures that are used in many of the other modules. They are collected here as a resource for project management as a whole.
These capabilities are enabled by the modules: , , , and .
